lead_paragraph: History will not fail to note, with more than a little irony, that the first American initiative in the war in the Pacific was directed against a group of islands acquired by Japan under a mandate from that same League of Nations on which the American people turned their backs in 1942. This group is the Marshall group, which Japan pledged itself not to fortify.
abstract: United Nations victory predicted by H Hoover
